import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Todo } from 'src/app/Models/Todo'; @Component({ selector: 'app-todos', templateUrl: './todos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./todos.component.css'] }) export class TodosComponent implements OnInit { todos:Todo[]; constructor () { } ngOnInit(): void { this.todos = [ { content: 'First todo', completed: false }, { content: 'Second todo', completed: false } ] } toggleDone (id: any) { this.todos.map((v, i) => { if (i == id) v.completed = !v.completed; return v; }) } deleteTodo (id: any) { this.todos = this.todos.filter((v, i) => i !== id) } }
